```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(recipes)
pkgload::load_all()
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, cache = TRUE, fig.align = "center", message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{r params}
year <- params$year
data_tbl <- params$data_tbl
```

The chosen year is `r params$year`.

```{r data}
tbl <- 
  data_tbl |> 
  compute_dx_gap()
```

```{r rec-core}
rec_core <- get_core_recipe(tbl)
```

```{r show}
rec_core |> 
  cook() |> 
  gt::gt()
```
